text:
Limpieza de datos inicial

# Remove rows that won't be used
df = df.loc[df['level_of_development']!='Not Specified']

# Fix data type
df['dt_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['dt_date'])

# Add Country Abreviations
df = pd.merge(df,country_abrev,left_on='country',right_on='name')
df.rename(columns={'alpha-3': 'abrev'},inplace=True)
df.drop(columns='name',inplace=True)

title: SUSTENTABILIDAD
text:
Tratamiento de datos faltantes

# Group by country and take the latest value available
latest_values = df.groupby('country').last().reset_index()


No se aplica ninguna técnica de imputación debido a que no es posible estimar con certeza los indicadores. Además, no es viable aplicar la regresión lineal debido a que los valores son complejos y no presentan un comportamiento lineal.
Durante el periodo de tiempo correspondiente a la base de datos, no se observó cambio alguno en el nivel de desarrollo de los países incluidos en la misma.
Se tomó el valor más reciente disponible de cada indicador para cada país.

title: SUSTENTABILIDAD
text:
Procesamiento de datos

# Encode target class
encoder = LabelEncoder()
encoder.fit(latest_values['level_of_development'])
latest_values['level_of_development_encoded'] = encoder.transform(latest_values['level_of_development'])
# Dictionary of encoded labels
encoder_name_mapping = dict(zip(encoder.transform(encoder.classes_),encoder.classes_))


cleaned = latest_values.copy()

# Drop columns that have too many missing values
cleaned.drop(columns = ['enhance_policy_coherence_for_sustainable_development', 'number_of_companies_publishing_sustainability_reports', 'national_action_plans_as_priority_national_policies'], inplace=True)

# Drop rows that have missing values
features_to_exclude  = ['land_degraded_over_total_land_area',
       'greenhousegas_emissione_mtco2equivalent',
       'randd_expenditure_proportionofgdp_perc',
       'co2emissions_from_fuel_combustion_in_millions_of_tonnes',
       'total_government_revenue_proportion_of_gdp_perc']

cleaned = cleaned.drop(columns=features_to_exclude).dropna(how='any')

# Drop columns that won't be used.
cleaned.drop(columns = ['dt_year', 'dt_date', 'region'],inplace=True)

title: SUSTENTABILIDAD
text:
Modelo Supervisado

# Drop categorical columns that won't be used
countries = cleaned[['country', 'abrev']]
cleaned = cleaned.drop(columns=['country','level_of_development','abrev'])

# Prepare data for supervised training
y = cleaned['level_of_development_encoded'].astype(np.int64)
X = cleaned.drop(columns = ['level_of_development_encoded']).astype(np.float64)

# Train test split
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, random_state=0, test_size=0.3, stratify = y)

# Instantiate Standard Scaler
scaler = StandardScaler()
scaler.fit(X_train)
X_train_scaled = scaler.transform(X_train)
X_test_scaled = scaler.transform(X_test)

lgb = LGBMClassifier()
lgb.fit(X_train_scaled, y_train)
